an10.89:1.1: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.89:1.2: “papiccha, bhante, sariputtamoggallana, papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
an10.89:2.1: Dutiyampi kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.89:2.2: “kincapi me, bhante, bhagava saddhayiko paccayiko, atha kho papicchava sariputtamoggallana, papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
an10.89:3.1: Tatiyampi kho kokaliko bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.89:3.2: “kincapi me, bhante, bhagava saddhayiko paccayiko, atha kho papicchava sariputtamoggallana, papikanam icchanam vasam gata”ti.
an10.89:4.1: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu utthayasana bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva pakkami.
an10.89:4.2: Acirapakkantassa ca kokalikassa bhikkhuno sasapamattihi pilakahi sabbo kayo phuto ahosi.
an10.89:4.3: Sasapamattiyo hutva muggamattiyo ahesum, muggamattiyo hutva kalayamattiyo ahesum, kalayamattiyo hutva kolatthimattiyo ahesum, kolatthimattiyo hutva kolamattiyo ahesum, kolamattiyo hutva amalakamattiyo ahesum, amalakamattiyo hutva tindukamattiyo ahesum, tindukamattiyo hutva, beluvasalatukamattiyo ahesum, beluvasalatukamattiyo hutva billamattiyo ahesum, billamattiyo hutva pabhijjimsu, pubbanca lohitanca paggharimsu.
an10.89:4.4: So sudam kadalipattesu seti macchova visagilito.
an10.89:5.1: Atha kho turu paccekabrahma yena kokaliko bhikkhu tenupasankami; upasankamitva vehase thatva kokalikam bhikkhum etadavoca:
an10.89:5.6: “Nanu tvam, avuso, bhagavata anagami byakato, atha kincarahi idhagato?
an10.89:6.1: Atha kho turu paccekabrahma kokalikam bhikkhum gathahi ajjhabhasi:
an10.89:11.1: Atha kho kokaliko bhikkhu teneva abadhena kalamakasi.
an10.89:11.2: Kalankato ca kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapajjati sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva.
an10.89:12.1: Atha kho brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho brahma sahampati bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.89:12.3: Kalankato ca, bhante, kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
an10.89:12.5: Idam vatva bhagavantam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi.
an10.89:13.1: Atha kho bhagava tassa rattiya accayena bhikkhu amantesi:
an10.89:13.2: “imam, bhikkhave, rattim brahma sahampati abhikkantaya rattiya abhikkantavanno kevalakappam jetavanam obhasetva yenaham tenupasankami; upasankamitva mam abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho, bhikkhave, brahma sahampati mam etadavoca:
an10.89:13.4: kalankato ca, bhante, kokaliko bhikkhu padumam nirayam upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva’ti.
an10.89:13.6: Idam vatva mam abhivadetva padakkhinam katva tatthevantaradhayi”ti.
an10.89:14.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an10.89:14.2: “kiva digham nu kho, bhante, padume niraye ayuppamanan”ti?
an10.89:14.5: ‘ettakani vassaniti va ettakani vassasataniti va ettakani vassasahassaniti va ettakani vassasatasahassaniti va’”ti.
an10.89:15.3: “seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho tato puriso vassasatassa vassasatassa accayena ekamekam tilam uddhareyya.
an10.89:15.4: Khippataram kho so, bhikkhu, visatikhariko kosalako tilavaho imina upakkamena parikkhayam pariyadanam gaccheyya, na tveva eko abbudo nirayo.
an10.89:15.5: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati abbuda niraya; evameko nirabbudo nirayo.
an10.89:15.6: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati nirabbuda niraya; evameko ababo nirayo.
an10.89:15.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ababa niraya; evameko atato nirayo.
an10.89:15.8: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati atata niraya; evameko ahaho nirayo.
an10.89:15.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati ahaha niraya; evameko kumudo nirayo.
an10.89:15.10: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati kumuda niraya; evameko sogandhiko nirayo.
an10.89:15.11: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati sogandhika niraya; evameko uppalako nirayo.
an10.89:15.12: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati uppalaka niraya; evameko pundariko nirayo.
an10.89:15.13: Seyyathapi, bhikkhu, visati pundarika niraya; evameko padumo nirayo.
an10.89:15.14: Padumam kho pana, bhikkhu, nirayam kokaliko bhikkhu upapanno sariputtamoggallanesu cittam aghatetva”ti.
an10.89:15.16: Idam vatvana sugato athaparam etadavoca sattha:
